content: Feb 1 Shares of Invitation Homes Inc  which is backed by private equity firm Blackstone Group  rose as much as 1.6 percent in their market debut on Wednesday  valuing the largest U.S. home rental company at about $6.14 billion.

content: SINGAPORE  Jan 25 Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte Ltd and Paramount Group have formed a joint venture to acquire office tower "60 Wall Street" in downtown Manhattan for $1.04 billion.
name: Paramount Group Inc
title: GIC leads $1.04 bln investment in office tower in downtown Manhattan
